anya-e0104n4:100_15: Yaṁ tayā ‘‘abhāvapāpakattā’’ti vadantena khandhābhāvo nibbānanti paṭiññātaṁ, taṁ na. Kasmā?

anya-e0104n4:100_20: atha kho vattamānānampīti tiyaddhagatānaṁ sabbesaṁ khandhānaṁ abhāvo nibbānaṁ.
anya-e0104n4:100_21: Na hi taṁ ekadesābhāvo bhavituṁ yuttanti vattamānā ce,

anya-e0104n4:101_3: tadā tassa nissayabhūtā khandhā vattamānāti katvā tadā nibbānassa abhāvo siyā.
anya-e0104n4:101_4: Tathā ca sati maggakkhaṇepi nibbānasacchikiriyāya abhāvo āpajjatīti dassento ‘‘vattamāna…pe…
anya-e0104n4:101_6: Na mayaṁ sabbesaṁyeva avattamānatāya nibbānaṁ vadāma.

anya-e0104n4:102_20: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṁ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṁ paramassāsabhāvena
anya-e0104n4:102_21: vinimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādayo khepetīti
anya-e0104n4:102_22: taṁsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṁ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvā taṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti vuccanti.

anya-e0104n4:102_25: Arahattañhi aggaphalapamukhā cattāro khandhāti na tassa rāgādikhayamattatā yuttā.
anya-e0104n4:102_28: Tattha yathā rāgādīnaṁ khīṇante uppannattā arahattaṁ ‘‘rāgakkhayo’’tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti suttassa neyyatthattā.
anya-e0104n4:102_29: Evaṁ nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgādayo khīyantīti nibbānaṁ ‘‘rāgakkhayo’’tiādinā niddiṭṭhanti imassāpi suttassa neyyatthatā veditabbā.
anya-e0104n4:102_30: Nibbānassa rāgādikkhayamattatāya bahūdosā āpajjantīti dassetuṁ ‘‘kiñca bhiyyo’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0104n4:103_12: añño mohakkhayoti tiṇṇaṁ akusalamūlānaṁ khayabhūtāni tīṇi nibbānāni,
anya-e0104n4:103_20: diyaḍḍhakilesasahassassa khaye pāṭiyekkaṁ nibbānanti bahūni nibbānāni honti.
anya-e0104n4:103_22: antamaso dīpimigamakkaṭādīnampi suviññeyyoti oḷārikaṁ nibbānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n4:103_27: Yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṁ pavatti na hoti,
anya-e0104n4:103_28: so ‘‘ayaṁ nāmā’’ti niyametabbo maggaphalañāṇānaṁ ārammaṇabhūto natthīti āha ‘‘na tādisassa khayassa abhāvato’’ti.
anya-e0104n4:104_1: yo pacchimabhavato tatiyattabhāveyeva rāgādīsu ādīnavaṁ disvā jhānabhāvanāya te vikkhambhetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṁ katvā brahmalokaṁ upapanno,

anya-e0104n4:104_4: tesaṁ rāgādīnaṁ vikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya anuppajjanato nirodhasadisatāya anuppattiyeva nirodho.
anya-e0104n4:105_0: Yadi ‘‘khayo’’ti vacanato yato khayato paṭṭhāya rāgādīnaṁ appavatti,
anya-e0104n4:105_4: 1382) ‘‘khayo’’ti vuttattā taduppattito paṭṭhāya ca rāgādīnaṁ anuppattīti maggassāpi nibbānabhāvāpattīti dassento ‘‘ariyamaggassa cā’’tiādimāha.

anya-e0104n4:106_6: Anuppattinirodhakkhayakarassa hi maggassa ārammaṇabhūtaṁ nibbānaṁ atthato tassa upanissayo viyāti vattabbataṁ labhati.

anya-e0104n4:112_2: Atha vā vedanādayo viya hetupaccayasamavāyasaṅkhātāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā na jātaṁ na nibbattanti ajātaṁ.

anya-e0104n4:112_13: Evaṁ apaccayampi samānaṁ ‘‘sayameva nu kho idaṁ bhūtaṁ pātubhūta’’nti āsaṅkāyaṁ taṁ nivattanatthaṁ ‘‘abhūta’’nti vuttaṁ.

anya-e0104n4:113_0: Evamettha satthā paramatthato nibbānassa atthibhāvaṁ pavedesi.

anya-e0104n4:115_2: yadi ajātādisabhāvā asaṅkhatā dhātu na abhavissa na siyā,

anya-e0104n4:115_4: Nibbānañhi ārammaṇaṁ katvā pavattamānā sammādiṭṭhiādayo ariyamaggadhammā anavasesaṁ saṁkilese samucchindanti,
anya-e0104n4:115_5: tenettha sabbassāpi vaṭṭadukkhassa apagamo nissaraṇaṁ paññāyati.
anya-e0104n4:115_6: Evaṁ byatirekavasena nibbānassa atthibhāvaṁ dassetvā idāni anugamanavasenapi taṁ dassetvā nigametuṁ ‘‘yasmā ca kho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n4:116_0: Ettha ca yasmā ‘‘appaccayā dhammā asaṅkhatā dhammā (dha. sa.
anya-e0104n4:116_6: yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo (dī. ni. 2.64, 67; ma. ni. 2.337; saṁ. ni. 2.172; mahāva. 7-8).

anya-e0104n4:117_9: Tathā sammutisaccārammaṇaṁ paṭhamajjhānādīsu ñāṇaṁ vikkhambhanavaseneva kilese pajahati,
anya-e0104n4:117_12: sammutisaccārammaṇassa ca ñāṇassa kilesānaṁ samucchedappahāne asamatthabhāvato tesaṁ samucchedappahānakarassa
anya-e0104n4:118_3: 41) evamādi nibbānassa paramatthato atthibhāvajotakavacanaṁ aviparītatthaṁ bhagavatā bhāsitattā.
anya-e0104n4:118_5: taṁ aviparītatthaṁ yathā taṁ ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā,

anya-e0104n4:118_8: tathā nibbānasaddo katthaci visaye yathābhūtaparamatthavisayo upacāravuttisabbhāvato.
anya-e0104n4:118_9: Seyyathāpi sīhasaddoti evamādīhi nayehi yuttitopi asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā paramatthato atthibhāvo veditabbo.
anya-e0104n4:119_2: tassa ‘‘gambhīro duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo’’ti (dī. ni. 2.64, 67; ma. ni. 2.337; saṁ. ni. 1.172; mahāva.
anya-e0104n4:119_8: ‘‘abyākatā dhammā apaccayādhammā’’tiādinā abyākatadhammāditā ca na vattabbā siyā.
anya-e0104n4:119_9: Na hi abhāvassa koci sabhāvo atthi,
anya-e0104n4:119_13: Kiñcāyamabhāvo sabbesaṁ kilesānaṁ sabbasattasantānagatānaṁ eko vā bhaveyya aneko vā. Yadi eko,
anya-e0104n4:119_16: aññesañca maggānaṁ niratthakatāti na siyā maggabahutā,
anya-e0104n4:119_18: Siyā panevaṁ eko eva so nibbānasaññito kilesābhāvo,
anya-e0104n4:119_21: Evaṁ sati visesato maggassa niratthakatā āpajjati,
anya-e0104n4:119_22: kilesānaṁ appahānatoti ekopi maggo na siyā.
anya-e0104n4:119_23: Asati ca kilesappahāne dukkhassa anupacchedanato kilesābhāvasacchikiriyā kimatthiyā siyā,
anya-e0104n4:119_24: atha pana maggānaṁ santānagatasaṁyojanattayappahānādipaṭiniyatakiccatāya catūsu maggesu pāṭiyekkaṁ kilesābhāvo.
anya-e0104n4:119_25: Evaṁ sati sabhāvapabhedena vinā na bahubhāvoti so kilesakkhayapariyāyena vutto sabhāvadhammo eva siyā.
anya-e0104n4:120_4: Tathā ca te saṁkilesasaṅkhatatādito kilesasaṅkhatatādiupacārāpi siyuṁ.
anya-e0104n4:120_7: Na ca pahoti upacarito bahubhāvo atthato bahubhāvāya.
anya-e0104n4:120_8: Na hi jalaṁ analanti upacaritaṁ dahati,
anya-e0104n4:120_10: Ekattapañhampi cāyamabhāvo asabhāvatāya na sahatīti na sakkā vattuṁ natthibhāvasāmaññato abhedavohāro yuttarūpoti.
anya-e0104n4:120_11: Ekatte ca pubbe vuttā eva dosā,
anya-e0104n4:120_12: bahubhāve pana sati vuttanayeneva siddhā sabhāvadhammatā.
anya-e0104n4:120_13: Sabhāvadhammattepi ca bahubhāvo viya bhāvaṁ bhāvopi bahubhāvaṁ na byabhicareyyāti nibbānassa bahubhāvapasaṅgo siyāti ce?
anya-e0104n4:120_17: Evaṁ sati sabbesaṁ bhāvānaṁ pathavībhāvāpattito kuto bhāvassa bahubhāvo,
anya-e0104n4:120_18: tasmā lokavohārānaṁ vicittatāya yadipi bahutā bhāvāpekkhā,
anya-e0104n4:120_19: bhāvatā pana na bahutāpekkhāti na bhāvassa sato nibbānassa bahubhāvo ‘‘ekā niṭṭhā na puthu niṭṭhā’’ti vacanato.
anya-e0104n4:121_0: Parinibbutānaṁ paccekaṁ nibbānabhāve sattasantānaniyataṁ nāma nibbānaṁ siyā.
anya-e0104n4:121_3: Tassa ca ekatte na maggabahutā kiccantarassa kattabbassa abhāvato.
anya-e0104n4:121_4: Maggabahubhāvo ca maggehi sacchikātabbe ekasmiṁ dhamme indriyānaṁ apāṭavapāṭavapāṭavatarapāṭavatamabhāvena
anya-e0104n4:121_5: sacchikiriyāvisesena kilesānaṁ pahānabhedena hotīti nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatte eva siyā.
anya-e0104n4:121_6: Abhāvopi ca kilesānaṁ maggena sakiccakatāya kātabbo eva siyā,
anya-e0104n4:121_10: so ce nibbānaṁ ekeneva maggena sabbakilesānaṁ abhāvo eko abhinno kātabbo āpanno.
anya-e0104n4:121_12: nibbānavisesappasaṅgo ca āpajjeyyāti maggakiccassa ekattena maggabahutā siyā.
anya-e0104n4:121_13: Bahubhāve pana tesaṁ so vuttanayena ekasmiṁ dhamme sacchikiriyāvisesatoti siddhā nibbānassa sabhāvadhammatā.
anya-e0104n4:124_2: tameva ca pāḷiṁ ānetvā uddesavasena idha ca vuttā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha dhammā atthato pakāsitā,
anya-e0104n4:124_5: kimatthiyaṁ pana idha kathananti āha ‘‘idha panā’’tiādi.
anya-e0104n4:124_6: Tattha ‘‘ekakkhaṇe pavattamānāna’’nti idaṁ lokiyakusalacittuppādesu viratiyo nānākkhaṇikā eva hontīti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0104n4:124_9: Vitthārato maggakathā parato āvi bhavissatīti āha ‘‘saṅkhepato’’ti.

anya-e0104n4:124_18: Maggadhammānaṁ paṭipakkhavidhamanākāro sātisayaṁ pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhātīti avijjānusayasamugghātakataṁ
anya-e0104n4:125_2: Evañhi catusaccapaṭivedhāya paṭipannassa yoginoti imamatthaṁ tathā-saddo upasaṁharati.

anya-e0104n4:126_6: sayañca samuṭṭhahanaṁ ghaṭanaṁ hotīti sammākammantasaṅkhātā viratipi samuṭṭhānasabhāvā vuttā.
anya-e0104n4:126_7: Sampayuttadhammānaṁ vā ukkhipanaṁ samuṭṭhāpanaṁ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṁ viya.
anya-e0104n4:127_6: Imassa hi pavattito paṭṭhāya micchājīvo na pavattatīti.

anya-e0104n4:146_2: evaṁ ahutvā sabbaṅgayogena dukkhatāya ceva ariyasaccatāya cāti attho.
anya-e0104n4:146_3: ‘‘Upādānakkhandhapañcaka’’nti vutte taṇhāyapi saṅgaho siyāti taṁnivattanatthaṁ ‘‘aññatra taṇhāyā’’ti vuttaṁ tassā visuṁ ariyasaccabhāvato.
anya-e0104n4:146_8: Itaraṁ pana ariyasaccadvayaṁ siyā samudayo attano phalassa paccayaṭṭhena,

anya-e0104n4:146_21: Sabbākārena pana asaṅkhatā dhātu nirodho ceva ariyasaccañca.

anya-e0104n4:149_3: Kātabbāpi hi kiriyā kārakarahitā kevalaṁ attano paccayehi tāya pavattamānāya dukkhasaññite dhammappabandhe kiriyaṁ karotīti vohāramattaṁ hoti.
anya-e0104n4:149_5: ‘‘Maggo atthī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘maggamatthī’’ti okārassa abhāvo katoti daṭṭhabbaṁ.

anya-e0104n4:150_3: nirodhassa vā na dukkhādibhāvoti nirodhāvasesattayānaṁ na aññamaññasamaṅgitāti āha ‘‘nirodhasuññāni vā’’tiādi.
anya-e0104n4:151_0: Samudaye dukkhassābhāvatoti ponobhavikāya taṇhāya punabbhavassa abhāvato.

anya-e0104n4:151_5: Yathā avibhattehi vikārehi mahāhaṅkāratammattavisesindriyabhūtavisesehi pakatibhāveneva ṭhitehi pakati sagabbhā icchitā pakativādīhi,
anya-e0104n4:151_6: evaṁ na phalena sagabbho hetūti attho.

anya-e0104n4:151_10: bīraṇesu kaṭo dvīsu aṇūsu dviaṇuka’’ntiādinā idha vuddhivohārajanako avisuṁ siddhānaṁ sambandho samavāyo,

anya-e0104n4:151_12: tīsu aṇūsu tiaṇukanti evaṁ mahāpathavīmahāudakamahāaggimahāvātakkhandhapariyantaṁ phalaṁ attano kāraṇesu samavetanti samavāyavādino vadanti.
anya-e0104n4:151_13: Evaṁ pana vadantehi aparimāṇesu kāraṇesu mahāparimāṇaṁ ekaṁ phalaṁ samavetaṁ attano antogadhehi kāraṇehi sagabbhaṁ asuññanti vuttaṁ hoti.
